snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg, imagining life after City Hall, is exporting vast quantities of financial, social and political capital to London, where he has long yearned for influence.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, imagining life after City Hall, is exporting vast quantities of financial, social and political capital to London, where he has long yearned for influence; he relies on parties and philanthropy to propel himself into city's upper echelon; Bloomberg Place, under construction, will be European home of his company and charity.
lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg, imagining life after City Hall, is exporting vast quantities of financial, social and political capital to London, where he has long yearned for influence.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Builds an Empire in London
headline.main: For a Global Life, Bloomberg Builds His Own British Empire
headline.print_headline: For a Global Life, Bloomberg Builds His Own British Empire
